note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
title: Respiratory infection death rate
subtitle: The reported annual death rate from [respiratory infections](#dod:respiratory-infections) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.

display.name: Age-standardized deaths that are from respiratory infections per 100,000 people, in both sexes aged all ages
